columns.id: The unique identifier of each building.
columns.name: The name of the building.
columns.City: The city where the building is located.
columns.Height: The height of the building in meters.
columns.Stories: The total number of stories in the building.
columns.Status: The current construction status of the building.

buildings.table_description: The table lists details of various buildings in the company.

columns.building_id: The unique identifier for each building location.
columns.company_id: The unique identifier for each company associated with the building.
columns.move_in_year: The year when a company moved into the building.

Office_locations.table_description: The table tracks office locations for companies within various buildings.

columns.id: The unique identifier for each company.
columns.name: The name of the company.
columns.Headquarters: The country where the company's headquarters is located.
columns.Industry: The industry sector in which the company operates.
columns.Sales_billion: The annual sales revenue of the company in billions.
columns.Profits_billion: The annual profit of the company in billions.
columns.Assets_billion: The total assets of the company in billions.
columns.Market_Value_billion: The market value of the company in billions.

Companies.table_description: The table lists various companies and their financial information.
